pageContext.claim: “Wow, what a tough sentence for Paul Manafort, who has represented Ronald Reagan, Bob Dole and many other top political people and campaigns. Didn’t know Manafort was the head of the Mob. What about Comey and Crooked Hillary and all of the others? Very unfair!”
pageContext.analysis: Manafort, Trump's former campaign chairman, hasn't been sentenced. He was jailed pending trial for violating bail conditions. A detailed indictment alleges he did unregistered lobbying work for a pro-Russia political party in Ukraine, conspired to launder money, and tampered with witnesses.
